short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that adds comments to any webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unlock the power of conversation with Comments Anywhere! This Chrome extension reintroduces the comment section on websites that have removed it, enabling you to engage in discussions and enrich your browsing experience.

We believe in the importance of community and open dialogue, and we've noticed that many websites have unfortunately discontinued their comment sections. Comments Anywhere is our answer to this problem, aimed at restoring and facilitating engaging conversations across the web.

With Comments Anywhere, you can effortlessly access and participate in meaningful discussions on any webpage, even if the site no longer features a comment section. Our extension blends seamlessly into your browsing experience, allowing you to toggle the comment section on or off with a single click.

Get Comments Anywhere today and help us revive the spirit of online conversations. Together, let's bring comments back to every corner of the internet!
